snippet.title: Hyde's Haunt and Seek - Official Trailer | Re-MIX Showcase July 2023
snippet.description:
Learn how to play Hyde's Haunt & Seek through the power of song in this musical trailer for the upcoming ghostly multiplayer horror game.

In Hyde's Haunt & Seek, spook or be spooked. Play as either the mortal Seeker, hunting for prized possessions of the dead, or as Ghosts, using pranks and scares to keep those pesky humans from your prize. It's multiplayer mayhem as ghouls clash with go-getters in a haunt...
